ing: 1 small apple - peeled, cored, and finely chopped
1 orange - peeled, sectioned, seeded, and finely chopped
1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and finely chopped, or more to taste
des: "Fruity flavors and racy hot peppers make this a zingy accompaniment to poultry or pork."
ins: Mix cranberries, apple, orange, sugar, shallot, jalapeno pepper, green onion, lime juice, and vinegar together in a bowl. Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate for flavors to blend, 4 to 24 hours.
